translated: The Chapter on the Conditions🔽The Triad-Couplet-Conditioned-Arising Discourse

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽16.58. Sanidassanattika, Āsavaduka🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho noāsavo dhammo
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sani dassana ttikaḥ āsava duka  anidassana appaṭigham āsavam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ no āsavaḥ dhammaḥ
translated: The Visible-Range, with Pollutants🔽With respect to a visible-range, with pollutants, phenomenon as condition, a non-visible-range, without pollutants, phenomenon arises.

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham āsavam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ
translated: With respect to a visible-range, with pollutants, phenomenon as condition, a non-visible-range, without pollutants, phenomenon arises. … With respect to a visible-range, with pollutants, phenomenon as condition,🔽a non-visible-range, without pollutants, phenomenon and a non-visible-range, with pollutants, phenomenon arise.

original: noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: noāsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigham āsavam dhammam paṭicca
translated: With respect to a visible-range, with pollutants, phenomenon as condition, a non-visible-range, without pollutants, phenomenon arises. With respect to a visible-range, with pollutants, phenomenon as condition, a non-visible-range, without pollutants, phenomenon arises. … With respect to a visible-range, with pollutants, phenomenon as condition,

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho noāsavo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti
analyzed: na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ no āsavaḥ ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ no āsavaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti
translated: a non-visible-range, without pollutants, phenomenon and a non-visible-range, with pollutants, phenomenon arise.

original: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanoāsavo dhammo
analyzed: hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha  anidassana appaṭigham noāsavam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na noāsavaḥ dhammaḥ
translated: (In brief.) With respect to a cause, six; with respect to an object, three; … With respect to a non-hindrance, six.🔽With respect to a non-visible-range, without pollutants, phenomenon as condition, a visible-range, without pollutants, phenomenon arises.

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham no āsavam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ
translated: With respect to a non-visible-range, without pollutants, phenomenon as condition, a non-visible-range, without pollutants, phenomenon arises. …

original: nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca🔽nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanoāsavo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nanoāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti
analyzed: na no āsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham no āsavam dhammam paṭicca  na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na noāsavaḥ ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na noāsavaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti
